    public class QuestionGeneratorPortlet
extends com.vaadin.server.VaadinPortlet
    Project: Masterthesis of Sascha Feldmann Creation date: 20.06.2016 Author: Sascha Feldmann (sascha.feldmann@gmx.de)

    University: Hochschule f√ºr Technik und Wirtschaft, Berlin Fachbereich 4 Studiengang Internationale Medieninformatik (Master)

    Company: adesso AG

    This is the Portlet class as defined in the portlet.xml. To add portlet initialization logic, extend the init() method here.
